name: wdio-allure-ts-example
description: Example of wdio-allure-ts usage with wdio, allure, typescript
author: Cloudinary <info@cloudinary.com>

scripts.test:ci: wdio wdio.ci.conf.js --spec ./lib/tests/EditTodoAngularTest.js && wdio wdio.ci.conf.js --spec ./lib/tests/RemoveTodoAngularTest.js && wdio wdio.ci.conf.js --spec ./lib/tests/ToggleTodoAngularTest.js
scripts.test:dev: PRINT_LOGS_TO_CONSOLE=true wdio wdio.dev.conf.js --spec ./lib/tests/EditTodoAngularTest.js && PRINT_LOGS_TO_CONSOLE=true wdio wdio.dev.conf.js --spec ./lib/tests/RemoveTodoAngularTest.js && PRINT_LOGS_TO_CONSOLE=true wdio wdio.dev.conf.js --spec ./lib/tests/ToggleTodoAngularTest.js
scripts._suite: Execute specific suite with CI configuration
scripts._spec: Execute suite with dev configuration and print logs to console
scripts._prepare: Clean workspace, run linter and compile
scripts._report: Create allure report and open it in FireFox
scripts.report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report &&  open -a firefox allure-report/index.html
